title: Sound On: Shutdown Averted, Budget Battles Ahead
itunes:title: Sound On: Shutdown Averted, Budget Battles Ahead
description:
Guests: Congressman Don Beyer, U.S. Representative of Virginia's 8th District, Tom Moroney, Bloomberg's Boston Bureau Chief, Joe Shortsleeve, host of Bloomberg Baystate Business, Maya MacGuineas, President of the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget, and Rick Davis, Bloomberg Contributor and Partner at Stonecourt Capital.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
